Greensboro.Former Pomona High School: Pomona High School, Former, also known as Lindley Junior High School, is a historic school building located at Greensboro, Guilford County, North Carolina. The original section was built about 1920, and is a two-story, nine bay, "U"-shaped, Classical Revival style building. Two projecting wings were added in 1940, and in 1951, the space was filled between the wings.
